snippet: Drones are already deployed by cops and crop researchers across the United States reveal new documents unearthed by an innovative crowdsourced public information request campaign. At least 18 police departments, universities and other government...
abstract: Drones are already deployed by cops and crop researchers across the United States reveal new documents unearthed by an innovative crowdsourced public information request campaign. At least 18 police departments, universities and other government agencies have received clearance from the federal government to send up a range of unmanned aerial vehicles, or drones.

headline.main: Who Is Flying Drones Over America?
